00024 class IBody
00025 {
00026 public:
00027     IBody(){}
00028     IBody(std::string type)
00029     {
00030         this->_type = type;
00031     }
00032     void setType(std::string type)
00033     {
00034         this->_type = type;
00035     }
00036     std::string getType()
00037     {
00038         return this->_type;
00039     }
00040 private:
00041     std::string _type;
00042 };
